entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING ENDED, Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 04:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 6.5°C
Wind: 31 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny in the morning. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
